s.text: It was a thoughtful, beautifully written meditation on the differences between a real-life community and a virtual community--a meditation provoked by the death of her father, who lived in Williamsburg, Mass., right up the road from me.
"But what did stay in sharp focus were the faces and voices of the people who came to the door or stopped me on the street to tell me they had known my father.
Wouldn't you prefer to see the face and hear the voice?
On some level, I feel the same way about the exercise we've just concluded.
On some level, I feel the same way about the exercise we've just concluded.
On some level, I feel the same way about the exercise we've just concluded.
